blogPost.content:
_First published in Newtown Literary, Issue 16 (Spring/Summer 2020)._

Go. Back. Home.  
three small words  
pierced the mundane  
Tuesday grocery run  
even though across  
the street was,  
had been for  
a dozen years,  
my only home.
blogPost.author: Luna Ranjit
blogPost.title: home
